customer_addr:
538 W Atlanta St SE
Marietta, GA 30060

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2.50 PM on June
12, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone. The registrant answered the call and asked to call
right back. Inspector waited 30 mins and never received a call back.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2.50 PM on June 
12, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone. The registrant answered the call and asked to call 
right back. Inspector waited 30 mins and never received a call back.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
